custom_margin_tablet=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

6 DIFFERENT STATE OF THE ART VENUES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CONFERENCE FACILITIES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#5f6060″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Looking for something more than the usual conference experience? 26 Degree South caters for all conferences, big and small. As a conference venue with accommodation, we have conference packages that include overnight hotel stays. So put your feet up with a hot cuppa in our business lounge and enjoy one of the best conference and corporate event venues in Muldersdrift.

Get your lastminute.com printing done in a flash at our Business Centre. Whatever you or your guests need, we’ve got your back. After all, our business is minding your business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”1300px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Thorn Tree Venue” image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/2.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Step of the beaten path and get the job done with FUNK!

  • Maximum of 200 delegates
  • Features include: Boho inspired features that bring out the idealist in you

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Bush Baby Venue” image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/4.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 Let’s get intimate in our modern yet stylish boardroom

  • Maximum of 9 delegates
  • Features include: Slide out into nature for some mind-blowing ideas

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Lapa Side Venue” image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/1.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let your surroundings feed your brain in our inside yet outside venue

  • Maximum of 60 delegates
  • Features include: Mountain views that bring serene and inspiration

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”1300px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Rhino Venue” image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/111B5204f.jpg” content_max_width=”1100px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”1.8em” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” max_height=”1000px” animation=”off” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Our business is minding your business in the intimate yet spacious venue

  • Maximum of 25 delegates
  • Features include: Private and calm surroundings

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Warthog Venue” image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/3.jpg” content_max_width=”360px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Whats poppin’?!, let our colourful venue give you a kick start

  • Maximum of 40 delegates
  • Features include: Colour so inspiring

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Kudu Venue” image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/4-1.png” content_max_width=”360px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When class meets bush-boho

  • Maximum of 40 delegates
  • Features include: A class-boho venue that means business

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0C71C3″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”14px||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”#OPEN” button_text=”CLICK HERE TO ENQUIRE” button_alignment=”center” module_id=”overlay_unique_id_24962″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
